attributes.action: all non british citizens who commit a crime are deported from United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: Non-British citizens who are over here for work/study should abide by British laws.If they commit a crime or fraud while here, they should be deported and prohibited from entering the United Kingdom ever again.Too many times on the news and in newspapers foreign nationals are coming to the United Kingdom and committing crimes some as serious as rape or murder.The U.K allows people to come here under the premise they will work or for study or to escape a country where they are in threat of their life.We will not tolerate abuse of the law and criminal activity to the detriment of the society where law abiding citizens reside.
